column2: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you at work, home, or with other people?
Do you happen to experience temper outbursts in response to relatively milder situations multiple times through the week?
Would you say that you are persistently irritable or angry most of the day, nearly every day?
Do you have excessive and persistent worries about specific situations?
Does the specific situation  always provoke anxiety?
Is the worry out of proportion to the actual threat?
Do you avoid the specific situation of worry or fear?
Do you have physical symptoms for worry or fear?
Do you have trouble speaking or unable to speak in specific situations in-spite of speaking in other situations?
Is the worry and related symptoms affecting your day to day activities?
Do you have excessive anxiety and worry (apprehensive expectation) occurring most of the day?
Which one of the following age groups apply to you?
What gender do you identify as?
Have you ever been diagnosed with any mental disorder?
Do you have any medical conditions present that may induce symptoms of mental disorder?
Do you have any history of substance usage or medication that may induce symptoms of mental disorder?
How long has it been since you experienced at least one of the symptoms you answered yes to?
